com.sheepguru.aerodrome.api

Class APIHttpClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sheepguru.aerodrome.api.APIHttpClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAPIHttpClient

    public class APIHttpClient
extends Object
implements IAPIHttpClient
    A wrapper for HTTPClient settings, and a builder class for building instances of that wrapper.
    Author:
    John Quinn

    • Constructor Detail

      • APIHttpClient

        protected APIHttpClient(String userAgent,
                        long readTimeout,
                        String accept,
                        String acceptLanguage,
                        boolean allowgzip,
                        boolean allowUntrustedSSL,
                        String host,
                        long crawlDelay)
                 throws URISyntaxException
        Create a new APIHttpClient instance
        Parameters:
        userAgent - The user agent
        readTimeout - The read timeout
        accept - The accept header value
        acceptLanguage - The accept language header value
        allowgzip - If gzip is allowed
        allowUntrustedSSL - If untrusted ssl is allowed
        host - The host (http://donkey.co)
        crawlDelay - some delay to use between requests
        Throws:
        URISyntaxException - If the host is invalid

      • createAcceptInterceptor

        protected org.apache.http.HttpRequestInterceptor createAcceptInterceptor()
        Adds Accept, Accept-Language and Accept-Encoding headers to the request. If allowgzip is set, this will set Accept-Encoding to gzip.
        Returns:
        interceptor
